label: GeolocatedFacility
comment: A production or manufacturing facility with precise geolaction attributes for both pin and area / boundary.

datatypeProperties.comment: The area of the facility as a URI - typically a plus code (see https://maps.google.com/pluscodes/)
The list of coordinates that define a closed area polygon as a facility boundary.
The latitude and logditude coordinates that best represent the location of this facility
The pin location of the facility - typically as agoogle pin reference
